extendedInfo.description: SPECTACULAR HIGH-CLASS ACTION RPG!A member of the Imperial Guard, Duke is imprisoned after defying an order to murder innocent civilians. There he is nursed to health by the Rebel princess Crystal. The two form an alliance to escape the prison and fight the Empire.Duke returns to find his hometown brutally occupied by the Imperial Army. He searches frantically for his childhood sweetheart Lena, but the path has dangers lurking at every turnâ¦_____________________FEATURESSTUNNING VISUALSExperience every action with awesome special effectsINTRIGUING STORYLINE AND CHARACTERSImmerse yourself with over 30 hours of captivating gameplayEXTENSIVE JOB TREESChoose from 3 main classes, 6 subclasses, and 39 skill treesFLEXIBLE ITEM-CONSTRUCT SYSTEMConstruct, combine, and disassemble items anywhere, anytime!PVP CHALLENGE + PET SYSTEMRaise and evolve a companion pet to fight with you in PVP!âââââââââââââââââââââ OTHER GAMEVIL GAMES Baseball SuperstarsÂ® 2011 ILLUSIA KAMI RETRO Soccer SuperstarsÂ®Touch MixZENONIAÂ® ZENONIAÂ® 2ZENONIAÂ® 3âââââââââââââââââââââ NEWS & EVENTS Website http://www.gamevil.com Facebook http://facebook.com/gamevil Twitter http://twitter.com/gamevil YouTube http://youtube.com/gamevi

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Such a fun game. They need a more party played PvP but other than that it\'s fun! Small file lets it run at great speeds without wifi!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Spellcaster class and multiplayer dungeons
reviews.comment: I enjoy the game a lot..however adding a healer/spellcaster class would enhance the game 10 fold also a raid style multiplayer dungeon system with bosses that drop phat loot would take this game to the next level
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.comment: Amazing animations. One of the best korean style rpgs on mobile, much better than zenonia. Great game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Perfect. After a long search of rpg games , at last i found the right.. very smooth, a lots of thrill.. 5 stara. For this game.. pls keep up the Update.. :)
reviews.author: jho aranas

reviews.title: Want more
reviews.comment: I\'m so hooked on this game. All I can say is I hope a sequel is in the works or something to that effect. I\'ll pay for it if it\'s as good as this. Keep it comin :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: A very nice game it can make u loving it.If the graphics is better,it will be the best action game.

reviews.title: awesome freaking game!
reviews.comment: what dah!must try guys, if u like tales of destiny or lunar in playstation console, ull love this game..im tempted to buy some coins,soon,support devs

reviews.title: Graphics must need improvement
reviews.comment: Awesome game easy to navigate through menu good storyline and I love how many armor equips threre are
reviews.author: Julius Reid

reviews.title: A game of epic proportions!
reviews.comment: This game is really cool. Simple yet immensely enjoyable. I love the auction system too. Looking forward for another installment!
reviews.author: Ernest Bradley Solis Arribe

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: I love it... fun to play and very challenging... good to have it..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: If u love zelda and dungeon fighter online u will love this game. It combines both games and is truly amazing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GreaT distraction
reviews.comment: Easy to pick up and play and you can really get into it easy to learn yet challenging to master
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game!
reviews.comment: Highly addictive, super fun, great story, and lots of action!  Ingredients of a great game; this IS a great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF?
reviews.comment: Ok it first became good im lvl 30  Now after I killed defcan second time IT FREEZES ON ME NOW I CANT GET BACK IN. FIX IT TO WHERE IT SAVES AUTOMATICALLY AFTER EACH CUTSCENE  UPDATE ASAP AND IT GETS 5 STARS AGAIN.
reviews.author: Don Sells

reviews.title: need more fun
reviews.comment: Very fun game excellent story. I love the way the pvp but Could you\'ve add make the pvp online I mean you can chat the person,trade, or go each other and farm,having like party system,  create some guild like that. Please update I like this game very fun
reviews.author: richard decierdo

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This is a well thought out rpg. And its free! I would probably pay for this. Lol. Good graphics, nice story line, and the characters seem real unlike some other apps ive played. Its like playing a different version of final fantasy. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE THIS GAME
reviews.comment: Greatest RPG that I have found so far. Reminds me of Secret of Mana mixed with WoW. Love Gamevil, Keep up the great games!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So very good keep up the good work
reviews.comment: Very good game i love it i wish there are more resulection Scrool and so much more up date keep it up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Feels like an MMO
reviews.comment: I don\'t like the gameplay of MMOs and that\'s exactly what this game felt like. Great graphics, standard gameplay, boring dungeons, and mindless grind quests. Check it out if you like MMOs
reviews.author: Brad Stapleton

reviews.comment: Love this game!! Please make destinia 2! Please! Best game on the market by far. Works perfect Love it love it love it
reviews.author: A Google User
